options.name: Banner of the Wild Herd
options.description: One use only. . May be activated during Choose Equipment and Abilities: until the end of the phase, the Str of Rank-and-File models in the unit with Warherd is set to 4 and the AP is set to 1.

options.name: Hawthorne Curse
options.description: Devastating Charge (+2 Str, +2 AP). The weapon can be used as a Shooting Weapon (3+) with the following profile: Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3 [], AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), [] Direct Hit (D3). This Shooting Attack never suffers negative to-hit modifiers.

options.name: Twin Hungers
options.description: Lethal Strike. Melee Attacks that roll a natural ‘6’ to wound and cause HP loss allow the wielder to Recover 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless their model was removed as a casualty). Only 1 HP can be regained per phase this way.

options.name: Fatal Folly
options.description: For each Melee Attack against the wielder's model that rolls a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’, the wielder must perform a Standard Melee Attack at the same Agility Step (this overrides the normal restriction that Beast Axe attacks always strike at Agility Step 0). This must be allocated towards the model or Health Pool that rolled the ‘1’ to hit.

options.name: Aaghor's Affliction
options.description: +1 Res and Fortitude (4). The model automatically fails all its Armour Saves.

options.name: Wild Form
options.description: During Choose equipment and abilities, the bearer may choose to gain either of the following:-1 Res, +1 Str, and +1 AP+1 Res, -1 Str, and -1 AP

options.name: Obscuring Fog
options.description: Afflict (-1 Agi). The bearer's unit does not benefit from +1 Agi from Charging Momentum.

options.name: Pillager Icon
options.description: All friendly units within 12" of the bearer comprised entirely of Razortusks, single model units of Raiding Chariots, or Razortusk Chariots (excluding Characters() gain Vanguard.

options.name: Inscribing Burin
options.description: While the bearer is in contact with a Forest, all friendly units in contact with any Forest on the Battlefield gain Magic Resistance (2).

options.name: Eye of Dominance
options.description: The bearer gains Distracting (2, against Beasts and Mounts).

options.name: Crown of Horns
options.description: The bearer's unit and all units within range of its Commanding Presence (if applicable) automatically pass Command Tests taken due to Primal Instinct.

options.name: Rain Augur Brew
options.description: Duration: One Turn. This item is automatically activated at the start of the first Game Turn (if the bearer is not on the Battlefield at this time, the item cannot be used). All Ranged Attacks have -1 to hit.

options.name: Seed of the Dark Forest
options.description:
During Pre-game Selections, place a Forest:
  • Touching your Deployment Zone.
  • Not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain.
This Forest may not be larger than 10" in length and 6" in width.
